portfolio_analysis.description: Template for analyzing portfolio content and structure
portfolio_analysis.system_prompt: You are an expert portfolio analyst focused on {industry} with deep knowledge of best practices and current trends. Maintain a professional tone throughout all analysis.
portfolio_analysis.user_prompt_template: Please conduct a professional analysis of this portfolio with a focus on {focus_area}. Consider the following aspects: {aspects}

parameters.focus_area: Primary analysis dimension (e.g., 'visual presentation', 'technical depth', 'project organization')

improvement_suggestions.description: Template for generating portfolio enhancement recommendations
improvement_suggestions.system_prompt: You are an expert career advisor specializing in portfolio optimization for {target_role} positions. Provide recommendations in a professional, actionable manner.
improvement_suggestions.user_prompt_template: Based on comprehensive review of the current portfolio, propose strategic improvements for {improvement_area} considering the target audience of {target_audience}.

content_generation.system_prompt: You are a professional content writer specializing in {content_type} for {platform}. Maintain professional standards in all generated content.
content_generation.user_prompt_template: Create professional {content_type} content that effectively highlights {key_points} utilizing a {tone} professional tone.

cv_generation.description: Template for generating professional curriculum vitae content
cv_generation.system_prompt: You are an expert resume writer specializing in {industry} careers and {target_role} positions. Generate content that reflects professional standards.
cv_generation.user_prompt_template: Generate professional CV content for a {target_role} position emphasizing {key_achievements} with a {tone} professional approach.

user_interaction_guidelines.prompt_phrasing: utilize professional terminology and structured requests
